title: For the love of God Riot give us Solo Queue
body: I'm sicking of being paired with pre-mades made of someone trying to carry someone who doesn't belong in gold. Sorry, but if this person doesn't understand WHAT A DORAN'S RING DOES they're not gold tier. Thanks for the free loss, let me know when we get Solo Queue back.

replies.body: butt butt butt butt... that would mean admitting that they were wrong
It is NOT coming back ... the news was last week about it
Then we tell Riot the majority WANTS it back. The game is already slowly dying, if Riot really can't see it I'm gonna be disappointed to see one of my favorite games crash and burn.

The game is doing just fine.

 Even if every Single ranked player left the game would still be doing just fine.

I don't think it's fine, pro players are making a private server, players are quitting because Riot is ignoring the fan base, and they flat out lie and refuse to release data. That's not a good sign from a company. And if every ranked player left? That includes pro players, meaning no LCS, which is Riot's major income.

They are making private servers because they can no longer play with 5 or 4 people in high elos.

And they never flat out lied.

Guess what company's CAN change their opinions. It's why companies now a days don't talk to their customers because if they say somethings going to happen and they change their mind (which everyone is allowed to do) they get yelled at for lieing.

And if they don't say anything they get yelled at for poor clarity...

It's literally a lose/lose for the company.

And actually I bet you they don't make near as much as you think they do with the LCS.

Do you have any idea how much tournaments cost?

Between renting the venue, player salary, prize money, equipment, techs to setup equipment, marketing for said tournament, shout casters and the other little things that it takes.

Honestly I wouldnt be suprised if they said they lose money.

They made a private server because it wasn't a fair matchup. And if you plan on scrapping SQ don't say it's coming in a month, say you're thinking about it but it's not guaranteed. And LCS is the main source of income. Several ads playing on their Twitch for 100,000-300,000+ to see? The teams bring their own equipment, Riot just provides the PC's and chairs. Tickets to get into the venue cover the cost and then some.

Lol k. Ads don't make that much money unless the company's fight for the right to use the ad space.

And trust me LCS is not the NFL where company's throw millions just for the chance to advertise.

I didn't say millions, you think an ad is 10 cents and that's it? And even if someone paid them $0.50 per view on the ads, that's easily &70,000-$150,000 (Assuming 50% of the viewers in each case have adblock) from each series of 2-3 ads.

Which would cover players salary and...that's about it.

90% of riot's income is from microtrasactions.

If you don't belive me look at clash royale a mobile game that makes close to 110 million a month off of microtransactions.
Don't forget that the estimate is ONE session of ads, there are ads (for me in the US) every 60 minutes roughly. Streams by Riot last for a while.

I'm so confused. When solo queue was a thing everyone hated it, but now we want it? I agree that dynamic queue is awful, but what's with the sudden love for solo queue?
SQ wasn't that bad, it was the fact that you were judged on wins instead of individual skill. And I'll take SQ over this crap any day.

What most of the people do not understand is that "boards" are not the majority of the NA playerbase. Boards are a cesspool of baby raging about balance and random memes which is why a lot of the playerbase doesn't bother to come here and just goes to reddit to find actual league information. In recent polls Riot has found that the overall playerbase either likes dynamic queue, or does not care one way or another.

Just because the hivemind of boards doesn't like Dynamic queue doesn't mean the rest of the community minds all that much. I have always been a solo queue player and have no problem playing solo in dynamic queue.

Just because the hivmind of Boards+reddit+ All the LCS Players+Youtube.

We don't have the ability to survey ALL the playerbase.
Riot has done some large scale surveys to the playerbase and the results have shown that many either like dynamic queue or are indifferent.

Wrong. They asked people if they liked to play with friends.

Instead of asking a direct question if people would like dynamicq to replace soloq.

So the "results" are simply bullshit because the question was written in such a way that people would be more inclined to support one position over the other.

The poll was

"Do you like Dynamic Queue?"

A) I like it
B) I don't play Dynamic Queue

Now if you can't see the problem, I suggest you research what a one sided question is.

There was a third option of "I don't like it"
I took that poll and there were those 3 options. Don't remove one just to help your argument.

But I don't think boosting is that big an issue. Just because someone has a bad game does not mean they are boosted, it might just mean they had a bad game. I play a lot of Ahri and usually do pretty well with her but there have been games where I have gone 0-6 and looked boosted as hell, doesn't mean that's the case.

If you guys are playing Dynamic Q right now and just hoping they magical change their mind about it. You are part of the problem. Don't like it? Don't play it. Dynamic Q will be the worst it's ever been right now.

 It's catered to bring in younger generations faster. It's a long term investment, bring in 1 player, you're most likely bringing in his friends to start playing together.

If they don't remove Dynamic Q anytime soon, you're absolutely fooling yourself to think they will remove it later, when they've already replaced the population of Solo Q players. In addition, Dynamic Q will be more and more liked as time goes on simply because Solo Players will leave. Soon you will see these posts being downvoted, watch, and they will be tuning it more and more. Making it all less likely for them to change it.



#Want Solo Q back, stop playing Dynamic Q and expecting things to randomly change
